amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for Smithsonian Institution salaries and expenses by $55,624,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to decrease Smithsonian salaries and expenses by $55,624,000 and transfer the funds to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 317 (Roll no. 669).
